title: Toss Juggling In-Sim (and on Hardware)
description: For my mechanics of manipulation course, I developed a simulation of a toss juggling robot in MuJoCo. I used reinforcement learning to learn a policy for the robot to juggle balls using DDPG. I also applied the co-design method to design a hardware system to embody the policy.

title: Model Predictive Control for Constrained Dynamic Systems
description: For my mathematical methods in robotics course, I developed a model predictive controller for a spined quadruped robot. I also applied a similar framework to a ballbot driving a wheelchair.

title: Phlebot
description: For my mechatronics capstone, my group developed a prototype autonomous venipuncture robot.

title: Mapping and Payload Robot
description: For my robotics engineering capstone, my group worked on developing an indoor delivery robot using off the shelf parts and ROS 1. I focused on the locomotion subsystem.

title: D'Manus Hand
description: My work on the D'Manus, an open-source rehensile robotic hand, during my time at Facebook AI research

title: Jenga Bot
description: The final project for my robot kinematics and dynamics course was designing a controller for a robot to build a Jenga tower, with bonus points for speed and a need for precision.

title: Brevis
description: A custom macropad I created as a precursor to a full-sized keyboard, and an exercise in electronics development.
